description: Cisco has added new security features that significantly mitigate brute-force and password spray attacks on Cisco ASA and Firepower Threat Defense (FTD), helping protect the network from breaches and reducing resource utilization on devices. [...]
title: New Cisco ASA and FTD features block VPN brute-force password attacks

description: The fourth day of Pwn2Own Ireland 2024 marked the end of the hacking competition with more than $1 million in prizes for over 70 unique zero-day vulnerabilities in fully patched devices. [...]
title: Over 70 zero-day flaws get hackers $1 million at Pwn2Own Ireland
